387.text:
At sea, the British passenger-liner Lusitania,
sailing from New York to Liverpool, is torpedoed

400.text:

410.text:
US President Woodrow Wilson and the American
public are outraged. But Germany insists the

422.text:

The Allies sustain 130,000 casualties, and

445.text: advance just a few thousand yards.
